commands.name: bind
commands.description: Bind you Discord account with your Genshin UID

description_localizations.zh-CN: 将您的Discord帐号与原神的UID绑定
description_localizations.ja: あなたの原神のUIDとDiscordのアカウントをバインドする

options.name: uid
options.description: UID of your Genshin Impact Account

commands.name: lookup
commands.description: Look up something about your account

description_localizations.zh-CN: 查询有关您的帐号的信息
description_localizations.ja: あなたのアカウントについて情報を検索する

commands.name: setlanguage
commands.description: Set your own bot answer language

description_localizations.zh-CN: 设置您的机器人回答语言
description_localizations.ja: あなたのボット返事言語を設定する

commands.name: character
commands.description: Look up data of your character in the game.

description_localizations.zh-CN: 查询您的游戏内的角色的信息
description_localizations.ja: あなたのゲーム内のキャラの情報を検索する

commands.name: sync
commands.description: Update and sync your character info from Enka.Network

description_localizations.zh-CN: 更新同步您的角色信息
description_localizations.ja: あなたのキャラ情報を更新して同期する

commands.name: help
commands.description: Send our user manual if you need help.

description_localizations.ja: ユーザーマニュアルを送る

commands.name: delrecord
commands.description: Delete your UID record in the bot.

description_localizations.ja: 登録済みのUIDを削除する
